product_name: Columbia Bugaboo Interchange 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: With a removable liner jacket that lets you adapt to changing weather, the women's Columbia Bugaboo(TM) Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket offers all-around winter performance at a great price. Wear the waterproof shell with zip-in liner jacket for maximum weather protection, or wear either piece on its own. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable nylon shell resists abrasion and breathes well; seams are sealed in critical places to keep moisture from entering. Shell features zippered handwarmer pockets, a zippered chest pocket, a goggles pocket and an interior security pocket. Removable zip-in/zip-out polyester liner jacket features 80g polyester insulation; jacket includes zippered handwarmer pockets. Liner jacket has an Omni-Shield(R) barrier that resists light rain and stains. Adjustable hood detaches easily, so you can leave it behind when you don't want it. Columbia Bugaboo(TM) Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket has a drawcord hem and adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs that seal out the elements and help retain warmth.
short_description: With a removable liner jacket that lets you adapt to changing weather, the women's Columbia Bugaboo(TM) Interchange 3-in-1 insulated jacket offers all-around winter performance at a great price.
